item.description:
This hike is for experienced hikers only. Hike is approx. 3 hrs with some challenging sections. Bring lots of water for you and your dog.

Please make sure your dog is on a leash in the parking area!

Directions from the Hartford area:
* Take I-91 S
* Take the MIDDLE ST. exit- EXIT 20- toward COUNTRY CLUB RD. (go .2 mi.)
* Turn LEFT onto MIDDLE ST. (go <.1 mi.)
* Turn RIGHT onto COUNTRY CLUB RD. (go 1.6 mi.)
* COUNTRY CLUB RD. becomes WESTFIELD RD. (go roughly .6 mi.)
* The entrance to Giuffrida Park will be on your right. [***NOTE: Going in this direction (south) it is the FIRST right after the quarry facility. Park entrance NOT marked!!! Looks like a street with no street sign.***]
item.how_to_find_us: There is only one parking area. Look for the white "Crate Escape" truck
item.name: Sunday Morning Hike in Meriden
